attributes.action: Re introduce rapid, daily, non laboratory, Community based testing for COV1D-19
attributes.additional_details:
Therefore, I would like to ask your 
support in requesting that the government re-evaluate their position on rapid testing as 
part of both community screenings and immunity certification. 

- Rapid, inexpensive,15 mins, non laboratory tests for COVID-19 are available 
- The message that these are inaccurate needs to change to. They will detect if you are transmitting or contagious
attributes.background:
We strongly believe that a lot of the misconceptions on testing are based on not 
knowing when to test, in which order to take tests and the importance of regularly testing.

departments.name: Department of Health and Social Care

rejection.details:
You may be interested in this petition calling for a similar action:

Provide publicly accessible testing for the covid-19 virus around the UK now. 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301354
